TopicTitle: KSP SOLAR PANELS BLOCKED BY THE SUN

Articles.Content:
Hello, I recently got some add-ons and it saying that THE SOLAR PANELS ARE BEING BLOCKED BY THE SUN. earlier, it said that it was in direct sunlight, but that was a couple days ago. since then I have got some more add-ons, and now they are getting blocked by the sun, which is supposed to be MAKING the power for the panels. SOMEBODY, PLEASE HELP ME FIGURE OUT WHAT IS CAUSING THIS TO HAPPEN!!! sorry i cant post an image right now

 

 

Edited September 3, 2017 by The_TwistedTaco
Well, we will need a pic of the mod list. It would also be helpful for you to tell us which mods you added recently.

mods installed:

modulemanager

communityresourcepack

interstellar extended

SSTU

KIS

KAS

Infernal Robotics

near future (props, propulsion, launch vehicles, electrical, spacecraft)

planetary base inc

SpaceY heavy lifters

SpaceY extended

B9 aerospace

Deepfreeze continued 

mechjeb2

REKT escape pods

albecure warp drive

kerbal atomics

OPT

community category kit

 

i suspect it is interstellar extended since that changes stuff with solar things but the mod creator isn't sure that is the problem

Also, just launched a probe and the blocked by sun thing stopped, i think that is just a glitch on the ground. but it still isn't receiving any electricity from the solar panels, so i have to use the infinite electricity cheat!
NEVER MIND IT IS STILL BEING BLOCKED BY SUN. so, is it near future electrical? if so, I can remove it, I don't really use that mod anyways...

I'd recommend moving KSPI and NF folders somewhere outside your GameData folder and then adding them one by one until you locate which one is causing trouble.

You will need a fresh save for testing of course, don't try to resume an existing one without mods it was started with, or it is likely to break.

just make a copy of the persistent.sfs or better yet make a named save and call it pre-testing or somting

 

i`d also recommend KAC and "screenshot and saves" thay can do backup`s of the games saves (i set it at a save every 30m and keep the last 100 saves)

15 hours ago, The_TwistedTaco said:

NEVER MIND IT IS STILL BEING BLOCKED BY SUN. so, is it near future electrical? if so, I can remove it, I don't really use that mod anyways...

Near Future Electrical does not modify solar panels in any way, shape, or form, nor does it provide any custom solar panels itself. I would be very surprised if removing it changes anything.  


Your first order of business should be to test with many different solar panels, both stock and modded, ideally from different mods. Does the problem happen with all of them, or just some?
A.) Just some of them: find out which mod they are from, and inquire in the mod thread if this is a known issue with a known solution, or if you can work together with other users or the author to try and track it down.
B.) All of them: here you will need to start testing yourself by removing large gameplay conversion mods (like KSP Interstellar) and other things which may not play nice with solar panels (like Kopernicus, but you don't seem to have that installed).

Do you have any planet packs installed? or extra Solar systems?

This error, I believe..., can be caused by a second sun out there somewhere.

Index your Gamedata folder, then do a search for "Template = Sun"
yes, i have KSP extrasolar installed.

17 hours ago, The_TwistedTaco said:

yes, i have KSP extrasolar installed.

Then I am betting that is the cause.

To attempt to solve it on my install, I cobbled together an MM patch that applies an intensity curve (I copied from the newest master branch of GPP on Github) to all items in my GameData folder that have "Template = Sun" and at first look, it seems to take care of it...

(that, and I shamefully removed Grannus from my install of GPP/GPP_Secondary)

how do i index the GameData folder?

Edited September 6, 2017 by The_TwistedTaco

okay, i tried uninstalling mods, and it says the folder access is denied. i tried uninstalling KSP and it still says i need admin permission, although i am the only acc on my PC and it is an admin! WTH!!!
